term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - gradient layer in chromatography
term.title: gradient layer

item.text: The chromatographic bed used in thin-layer chromatography in which there is a gradual transition in some property.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 830 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
